divs: Sighting DetailsI was talking with my boyfriend on our deck and looked over into the sky and only for five secs did I see an object with a light trail ascending into the sky and then disappearing making no noise at all. It was bigger than a firework and a huge ball of light, however, I could not see it in the sky after it reached the clouds. My boyfriend did not see it and thought I was crazy, but the ball of light was HUGE almost like a missile but made no noise at all. They are real.
Summary: Juge ball of light with a long trail of light ascending into the clouds at highspeed
trends: There have been 110 other sightings in Seattle
There was one other sighting in Seattle on or around August 11th 2012
